title: I Want To Be More Trusting
description:
18-year-old Lucy says she's becoming more distrustful and a little paranoid since she has gone to college and started dating. - Dr. Laura: "Let the good values you were raised with guide and protect you."

Did your upbringing guide you well through your young adult years? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. 

Find me on social media at:

Facebook.com/DrLaura

Instagram.com/DrLauraProgram

YouTube.com/DrLaura
